verses.roman:
śunitei bhaṭṭācārya ulaṭi' cāhila
tāṅra avadhāna dekhi' amogha palāila

synonyms: śunitei—hearing; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; ulaṭi' cāhila—turned his eyes upon him; tāṅra—his; avadhāna—attention; dekhi'-seeing; amogha—Amogha; palāila—left.
translation: As soon as Amogha said this, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya turned his eyes upon him. Seeing Bhaṭṭācārya's attitude, Amogha immediately left.
